name: Toke Machine
details:
Octave fuzzThe Toke Machine is a super loud and super thick fuzz with an octave up overtone via a 2nd footswitch. 
The controls include three straight forward knobs: Volume, Tone, Fuzz; a toggle switch labeled "destroy" which when in the up position will engage diode clipping which will increase volume & intensity of the fuzz; Octave footswitch engages a vintage style octave up overtone for sick leads. 
https://www.abominablepedals.com/products/toke-machine
